manpage.author: Brian Langenberger
manpage.name: prints the total length of all tracks
manpage.title: Track Length
manpage.description: tracklength takes a list of audio tracks and writes their total length to standard output in hours:minutes:seconds format. If directories are given, tracklength searches them recursively and adds the length of any supported audio files found to the total.
